posts.post_content:
Sharp photo. No creases. I guess the back is the reason for the grade.
$1200ppd.  Please pm.   Thank you.  -Peter
Peter, if I didn't already have this card in this pose, I'd be all over this one!  Beautiful example...doesn't get much better, IMO!
